name: GizmoTrends

”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: GizmoTrendsIN is a technology publication based out in India featuring content related to technology, gadgets, traveling, etc. We make our own unbiased gadget reviews, buying guides, and recommendations. We are proud Google News Publishers, writing some good content since 2018. Our team includes numerous members belonging to many different countries out there! As our name suggests we are covering multiple #trending gadgets. About more than half of our total readers are university or college graduates. They’re between the age of 20-25 and are deeply interested in technology, smartphones, giveaways, etc. They also pursue their education in related fields. Working with our blog will provide you exposure to this target audience, which might otherwise require other tedious ways.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
